description: Fettuccine noodles are tossed with artichoke hearts, fresh basil and silky sun-dried tomato hemp seed Alfredo in this vegan twist on an Italian classic.
name: Fettuccine with Artichokes, Basil and Sun-Dried Tomato Hemp Seed Alfredo
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
1/2 cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes (drained (plus a few extra for garnish, if you'd like)
8 oz. artichoke hearts (canned or frozen and thawed, quartered)

recipeInstructions.text: Place hemp seeds, garlic, lemon juice, salt and 1/2 cup milk into food processor. Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of bowl as needed. Add remaining milk and blend again until smooth. Add 1/2 cup sun-dried tomatoes and pulse a few times until very finely chopped (or completely blended in, if you prefer).
